args.natural_language_statement: Translate into Lean4: Prove the polarization identity 4 z\bar{w} = |z+w|^2 - |z-w|^2 + i ( |z+ i w|^2 - |z - i w|^2 ).

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open ComplexConjugate
open scoped SMul
open Submodule
open ComplexConjugate

/-- Prove the polarization identity 4 z\bar{w} = |z+w|^2 - |z-w|^2 + i ( |z+ i w|^2 - |z - i w|^2 ). -/
theorem polar_identity_4z_bar_w (z w : ℂ) : 4 * z * (star w) = ↑(Complex.normSq (z + w)) - ↑(Complex.normSq (z - w)) +
    Complex.I * (↑(Complex.normSq (z + Complex.I • w)) - ↑(Complex.normSq (z - Complex.I • w))) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Polarization identity:
    4 * z * conj w = |z+w|^2 - |z-w|^2 + i (|z + i w|^2 - |z - i w|^2)

  Here we expand the squared norms as z * conj z. -/
theorem polarization_identity (z w : ℂ) :
  4 * z * Complex.conj w =
    (z + w) * Complex.conj (z + w) - (z - w) * Complex.conj (z - w) +
    Complex.I * ((z + Complex.I * w) * Complex.conj (z + Complex.I * w) - (z - Complex.I * w) * Complex.conj (z - Complex.I * w)) := by sorry
